author: Source: Knutsford Guardian
title: Some Mothers Do 'Ave 'Em to make BBC comeback? - Knutsford Guardian
text:
Michael Crawford and Michele Dotrice could be reunited on screen for a TV revival of BBC sitcom Some Mothers Do 'Ave 'Em. The two stars, who played disaster-prone Frank Spencer and his patient wife Betty, are said to have been in talks for a comedy comeback, reported the Daily Mirror.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Knutsford Guardian.
